attributes.action: Help families on universal credit who need to get food + essentials for family
attributes.additional_details:
People on universal credit are struggling to get what we need due to people stock piling. There are no nappies, baby wipes or food ect to suppose our families and we get paid monthly so we cannot get everything we need for the month to survive. Please help us to be able to support our families and or children. 
I for one am struggling to get food or nappies for my children. 
Some families cannot work and have to use universal credit we are not invisible we are human beings. Help us too. Thanks
attributes.background:
People on universal credit are struggling to get the essentials they need for their families. 
Help us get what we need and think about us too
We get paid monthly and that doesn’t help with this coronavirus going on. 
We need help and support to get what we need for our families.
